stentry.xref: NAMEA NAME is used as a label for referencing content.Use NAMEs that clearly and unambiguously identify the content.

stentry.xref: SETTINGSSETTINGS are one or more key=value pairs, sparated by a comma. Use SETTINGS to customize the behavior of a command.

entry.xref: DIMENSIONA DIMENSION is an amount of linear distance. ConTeXt understands several units of measurement, and we can mix different units in the same document.
